description: Show the full details of a time sheet line item.
permissions: Delegated to the related time sheet. Allowed if the user is an admin or is authorized for the associated time sheet per TimeSheetPolicy scope (e.g., driver/shift driver, trucker manager, broker member, customer member/manager, laborer on the crew requirement, or work-order roles such as manager/operations/technician).
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (time sheet line item ID).
